title: i WANT MY ACCOUNT BACK OMG
body: ok, riot i want my account back, timefreak105. i lost this account last year around november 2016, i spent 100$ on this account, and shortly after, i could'nt log back into it. i really want to get this account back, please help me

replies.body: We can look into that directly with you through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416).  Fill that out, and our account team will take a look and help with getting the account back into your hands.  We'll see you there!
